title: payment.amount
description: Canonical amount + asset pair for CommandLayer commercial verbs (checkout, purchase, refund, etc.).

value.description: Decimal amount as a string (e.g. "0", "10", "10.50"). No leading + or leading zeros.

asset.description: Asset identifier (e.g. USDC, USD, ETH, or a token address/spec).

pricing_tier.description: Optional provider-defined tier (e.g. basic, pro, enterprise). Non-normative.

metadata.description: Optional payment-related metadata (invoice IDs, internal refs, etc.).
